primevc.core.validators.IntRangeValidator

type
class
implements
IValueValidator_Int
This class can constraint the value of an int to the given min and max value.

Constructor

new(?min : Int, ?max : Int)

Instance Variables

change(default,null) : primevc.core.dispatcher.Signal0

max(default,setMax) : Int

min(default,setMin) : Int

Instance Methods

inline dispose() : Void

inline getDiff() : Int
